sentences.english: "And I, " returns the sky, "your humble touch. "

sentences.english: He didn't agree to your opinions, but said so in a roundabout way.

sentences.english: Later on, he went to several other places.
sentences.chinese: 不久後，他又宛轉了好幾個地方。
